summary: Rock sensation Barbie and her band The Rockers, beloved by everyone all around the world, decide to do something no band has ever done before - preform a charity rock concert in outer space.
cast: Sharon Lewis|John Stocker|John Payne|Veena Sood|Doc Harris|Debbie Lick|Viktoria Langton|Nikki Sharp|Garry Chalk|Lynn Johnson|Catherine Mead|Michael Benyaer|Doug Parker|Maggie Blue O'Hara|Ruby Smith-Merovitz|Kari Wahlgren
title: Barbie and the Rockers: Out of This World
